data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ralph, Taryn M. C., Richards, Leigh R., Taylor, Peter J., Napier, Melanie C., Lamb, Jennifer M. (2015): Revision of Afro-Malagasy Otomops (Chiroptera: Molossidae) with the description of a new Afro-Arabian species. Zootaxa 4057 (1): 1-49, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4057.1.1
